proof.th: A ∧ B ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ∧ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ A ∨ B ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ A ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, A ⊢ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ A ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ B ∨ C ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C ⊢ B ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C, B ⊢ A ∨ B
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C, B ⊢ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C ⊢ B ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C ⊢ C ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C, C ⊢ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C ⊢ C ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
B ∨ C, A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ B ∨ C ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C

proof.th: ∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∃x. A x ∧ B x
∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀a. A a ∧ B a ⟶ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
A a ∧ B a ⊢ A a ∧ B a
A a ∧ B a ⊢ A a
A a ∧ B a ⊢ ∃a. A a
A a ∧ B a ⊢ B a
A a ∧ B a ⊢ ∃a. B a
∃x. A x ∧ B x, A a ∧ B a ⊢ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀a. A a ∧ B a ⟶ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
⊢ (∃x. A x ∧ B x) ⟶ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)

proof.th: ∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ (∀x. A x) ∧ (∀x. B x)
⊢ (∀x. A x ∧ B x) ⟶ (∀x. A x) ∧ (∀x. B x)
⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ B ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C

proof.args: disjI1, {}, {A: A ∧ B, B: A ∧ C}
proof.th: A ∧ (B ∨ C), B ⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ B ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ C ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C

proof.args: disjI2, {}, {A: A ∧ B, B: A ∧ C}
proof.th: A ∧ (B ∨ C), C ⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ C ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⟶ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ⟶ A
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ⟶ A
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ C ⟶ A
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ C ⟶ A
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ⟶ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C, A ∧ B ⊢ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ⟶ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ C ⟶ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C, A ∧ C ⊢ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ C ⟶ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⟶ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
¬(∀x. P x), ¬(∃x. ¬P x) ⊢ ¬P x ⟶ P x
¬(∃x. ¬P x), ¬(∀x. P x), ¬P x ⊢ P x
¬(∀x. P x), ¬(∃x. ¬P x) ⊢ ¬P x ⟶ P x
∀x. P x ⊢ P x ⟶ (∀x. P x)
∀x. P x ⊢ P x ⟶ (∀x. P x)

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a}, {P: λx. P x ⟶ (∀x. P x), a: x}
proof.th: ∀x. P x ⊢ ∃a. P a ⟶ (∀x. P x)
¬(∀x. P x), ¬P x ⊢ P x ⟶ (∀x. P x)

proof.args: negE_gen, {}, {A: P x, C: ∀x. P x}

proof.th: ¬(∀x. P x), ¬P x ⊢ P x ⟶ (∀x. P x)

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a}, {P: λx. P x ⟶ (∀x. P x), a: x}
proof.th: ¬(∀x. P x), ¬P x ⊢ ∃a. P a ⟶ (∀x. P x)
¬(∀x. P x) ⊢ ∃x. P x ⟶ (∀x. P x)
